content.rendered:
Experience:

  • 5 years’ experience
  • Shall assist in translating and articulating new requirements for risk adjudication and connection processes and understanding the risk associated with those new requirements

Assist in providing analysis and assessment of current and new IA/Cybersecurity policies as they apply to the DISN

Education Requirement:

  • Bachelor’s degree (IT-related field preferred)

excerpt.rendered: Experience: Assist in providing analysis and assessment of current and new IA/Cybersecurity policies as they apply to the DISN Education Requirement:
